meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chris Holden Jennifer Wu Courtney Bennis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4484.

td.p: Chris Holden, a senior from Carlisle, Pennsylvania
Jennifer Wu, a sophomore from Arkadelphia, Arkansas
Courtney Bennis, a senior from Virginia Beach, Virginia

tr.td: U.S. GOVERNMENT
MOM SAYS...
MUSIC CLASS
3 LETTERS LONG
A TRIP TO THE MOON
ARE YOU GAME?

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the House of Representatives

Jennifer
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The Constitution says that all revenue bills must originate in this legislative body')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The Constitution says that all revenue bills must originate in this legislative body

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '(Cheryl of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) You call that music? When I was your age, we listened to real music; like The Who, the Stones and this other group from England we called the Fab Four')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) You call that music? When I was your age, we listened to real music; like The Who, the Stones and this other group from England we called the Fab Four

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Chris: What is rap?)
(Courtney: What is pop?)
...
(Alex: It\'s a 3-word name, not a 3-letter name; [*].)

rock and roll

CourtneyChris
Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', 'Disc jockey Alan Freed is credited with giving this 3-word style of music its name back in 1951')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Disc jockey Alan Freed is credited with giving this 3-word style of music its name back in 1951

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_4_1', 'clue_J_4_1_stuck', 'Titanic wireless operator Jack Phillips sent out two 3-letter distress calls, CQD & this new one')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Titanic wireless operator Jack Phillips sent out two 3-letter distress calls, CQD & this new one

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', 'As of 1988, the U.S. Census Bureau determined that 13% of the U.S. still believed part of the Moon was made of this')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: As of 1988, the U.S. Census Bureau determined that 13% of the U.S. still believed part of the Moon was made of this

tr.td: This popular playground hopping game may have begun in the Roman Empire as a military training exercise

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Cheryl of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) You\'re going out with your friends? Wouldn\'t you rather stay home and watch grandpa\'s home movies from Mount Rushmore in this state?')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Cheryl of the Clue Crew presents the clue.) You're going out with your friends? Wouldn't you rather stay home and watch grandpa's home movies from Mount Rushmore in this state?

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_4_4', 'clue_J_4_4_stuck', '(Courtney: What is D.S.T.?)
(Jennifer: What are E.S.T.?)
...
(Alex: What are [*]?, Eastern Daylight Time.)
[Prior to the Double Jeopardy! Round, Alex credits Courtney with a correct response and gives Jennifer back the $800.]

E.D.T.

Courtney
')

craters

')

div.onmouseover:

allowance

')

a lunar eclipse

')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Alex: Courtney, you\'re in the red; means you cannot play Final Jeopardy! today, but because this is a two-day total point affair, and we add today\'s score to tomorrow\'s; with one exception: we do not penalize players who finish in the red. So your -$600 goes to $0, so you will have to build in tomorrow\'s game, all right?)

the New York Liberty

Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_2_5', 'clue_DJ_2_5_stuck', '(Hi, I\'m Becky Hammon.) I\'m carrying a torch--not for someone, but on my uniform as a member of this WNBA team')

')

tr.td: Courtney

toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Jennifer] You\'re absolutely right, [*].)
[Jennifer smiles and pumps her fist.]
JenniferWhat is Chinese?

ChrisWhat is Chinese?
$4,200
Mandarin Chinese')

tr.td: THE UNITED NATIONS
Of the 6 official languages used by the U.N., the one that's the native tongue of the most number of people
Courtney
Jennifer
Chris
Courtney
Jennifer
Chris

9 R,
5 W

28 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W
(including 1 DD)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
